text: Jiří Novák and David Rikl were the defending champions but lost in the second round to Tomás Carbonell and Nicolás Lapentti. Guillermo Cañas and Rainer Schüttler won in the final 4-6, 7-6 (7-1), 6-4 against Michael Hill and Jeff Tarango. ==Seeds== Champion seeds are indicated in bold text while text in italics indicates the round in which those seeds were eliminated. All eight seeded teams received byes to the second round. ==Draw== ===Final=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==External links== * 2001 Mercedes Cup Doubles Draw Doubles 2001 Stuttgart Doubles
title: 2001 Stuttgart Open – Doubles
